    Mikel Egana Aranguren, Eurohelp Consulting S.L.

      • validateURI

        public static String validateURI(String uri)
                          throws URISyntaxException
        Verifies the validity of a complete URI
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI to verify
        Returns:
        the URI to verify
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException - the URI is invalid

      • URIfy

        public static String URIfy(String regexp,
                           String replacement,
                           String targetstring)
        Converts a String to a form suitable to be included as part of a URI. The default should suffice in many cases
        Parameters:
        regexp - the regular expression that captures the characters to replace. If null is provided, the default is "\\(|\\)|\\s|\\/|\\.|:", thus capturing "(",")"," ","/",".".
        replacement - the character to replace the captured ones with. If null is provided, the default is "-"
        targetstring - the string to be converted
        Returns:
        the converted string
